title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Super Bowl preview and pick; Brady and Gronk's last game?; Bad NFL Combine rule; Jason Garrett's prove it year;
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Super Bowl preview and pick; Brady and Gronk's last game?; Bad NFL Combine rule; Jason Garrett's prove it year;
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  

In this episode, Middlekauff previews Super Bowl LIII and makes his ATS pick, if this is Brady and Gronk's swan song, why the NFL's combine rule barring players with domestic violence records is hypocritical, why Jerry Jones is right to not extend Jason Garrett, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
